trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs> provides the <xref:System.Exception> that was caught in the binding process.
The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `BindingManagerBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`BindingManagerBase1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that occurred in the binding process that caused the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" /> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 在绑定过程中发生的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />，它导致 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" /> 事件被引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> caught in the binding process that caused the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" /> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 获取在绑定过程中捕获的导致 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 事件被引发的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that caused the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" /> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 导致 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 事件被引发的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `BindingManagerBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`BindingManagerBase1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
